articles.title: How squash helped Abhay Singh drop 26 kilos in a year as a teen, and propelled him to stardom after Asian Games - The Indian Express
articles.description: India's squash hero, who had dropped weight to get fit as a teen, almost quit the sport post poor results after Covid, but gave it one last go when trials for Asiad squad were announced in January 2022
